comment.author: 37183379@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Clan Ross, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 15424763@N00
comment._content: According to S. C. Gwynne's Empire of the Summer Moon, this boy was adopted by Sul Ross, became the general's horse tender in 135 Civil War engagements, married a former slave, became a "respectable citizen" of Waco, and died in 1883.
